mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_user_query_conditions (id, user_id, interface_name, query_params, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{interfaceName}, #{queryParams}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE query_params = VALUES(query_params), update_time = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, interface_name as interfaceName, query_params as queryParams, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM b_user_query_conditions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND interface_name = #{interfaceName} ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_user_query_conditions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND interface_name = #{interfaceName}
